scripts.build:cypress: turbo run build --filter schema --filter prosemirror* --filter prosemirror-utils --filter sidenotes --filter emoji
scripts.clean: turbo run clean --parallel && find . -name '.turbo' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' +
scripts.test:ci: turbo run test --filter schema --filter prosemirror* --filter prosemirror-utils
scripts.publish: npm run clean && npm run build -- --force && changeset publish && git push --follow-tags
